results.title: Mesenchymal stromal cells-based therapy in a murine model of elastase-induced emphysema: Simvastatin as a potential adjuvant in cellular homing.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the results suggest that both AD-MSC and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatments could promote an improvement of morphological recovery of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Emphysema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011656 @@@pulmonary emphysema@@@, that it was more pronounced in the right lung.

citations.NLM: Arruda de Faria C, Silva Júnior WA, Caetano Andrade Coelho KB, Bassi M, Colombari E, Zanette DL, Ribeiro-Paes JT. Mesenchymal stromal cells-based therapy in a murine model of elastase-induced emphysema: Simvastatin as a potential adjuvant in cellular homing. Pulm Pharmacol Ther. 2021 Oct;70():102075. results.title: Reversal of elastase-induced pulmonary emphysema and promotion of alveolar epithelial cell proliferation by simvastatin in mice.
